TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE in GPE .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant obtained a ORG special - purpose commodity bond ( облигация государственного целевого беспроцентного займа ) . By its terms the ORG undertook to give her a NORP - made ORG passenger car .
CARDINAL . It appears that in DATE the applicant requested the ORG to comply with its obligation , but it could not be fulfilled for want of cars .

CARDINAL . After the change in legislation in DATE and DATE , the applicant became entitled to compensation in the amount equal to the car value , as described in the bond and determined in co - ordination with car manufacturers at the moment of redemption .
CARDINAL . It appears that in DATE the applicant received partial compensation .
CARDINAL . In DATE she sued the Government for the full market value of the car .
CARDINAL . By judgment of DATE , ORG of GPE awarded her MONEY ( RUB ) against ORG . On DATE ORG of GPE upheld the judgment .

CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiff instituted enforcement proceedings . On DATE the bailiff returned the writ of execution to the applicant . On DATE , the applicant re - submitted it to ORG . Upon the ORG 's instructions , on DATE the applicant forwarded her writ to ORG in GPE .
CARDINAL . NORP By letter of CARDINAL DATE the ORG returned the writ to the applicant , indicating that it should be submitted to ORG . The applicant sent the writ to ORG on DATE
CARDINAL . On DATE the Ministry informed the applicant that it would not enforce the judgment because supervisory - review proceedings had been pending .
CARDINAL . The applicant received the monies due to her on DATE .
